seriesJson.title: Ernest Bloch: The man and his music
seriesJson.description: Documentary/music series about the life and work of the late Swiss composer Ernest Bloch, featuring his daughter, Suzanne, of The Julliard School of Music. With her commentary are readings by actors, including Robert Morris. More info next entry.
